segments.en: Numbered Discourses 8
5. Sabbath
50. Winning in This Life (2nd)

segments.pli: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, ayaṃsa loko āraddho hoti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a female who has four qualities is practicing to win in this life, and she succeeds at it.
What four?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo susaṃvihitakammanto hoti, saṅgahitaparijano, bhattu manāpaṃ carati, sambhataṃ anurakkhati.
segments.en: It’s when a female is well-organized at work, manages the domestic help, acts lovingly toward her husband, and preserves his earnings.
And how is a female well-organized at work?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo ye te bhattu abbhantarā kammantā … pe …
segments.en: It’s when she’s skilled and tireless in doing domestic duties for her husband …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo susaṃvihitakammanto hoti.
segments.en: That’s how a female is well-organized at work.
And how does a female manage the domestic help?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano … pe …
segments.en: It’s when she knows what work her husband’s domestic bondservants, employees, and workers have completed, and what they’ve left incomplete. She knows who is sick, and who is fit or unwell. She distributes to each a fair portion of various foods.

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saṅgahitaparijano hoti.
segments.en: That’s how a female manages the domestic help.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṃ carati?
segments.en: And how does a female act lovingly toward her husband?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yaṃ bhattu amanāpasaṅkhātaṃ taṃ jīvitahetupi na ajjhācarati.
segments.en: It’s when a female would not transgress in any way that her husband would not consider loveable, even for the sake of her own life.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṃ carati.
segments.en: That’s how a female acts lovingly toward her husband.
And how does a female preserve his earnings?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yaṃ bhattā āharati … pe …
segments.en: It’s when she tries to guard and protect any income her husband earns …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo sambhataṃ anurakkhati.
segments.en: That’s how a female preserves his earnings.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, ayaṃsa loko āraddho hoti.
segments.en: A female who has these four qualities is practicing to win in this life, and she succeeds at it.

segments.pli: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo paralokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraloko āraddho hoti.
segments.en: A female who has four qualities is practicing to win in the next life, and she succeeds at it.
What four?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saddhāsampanno hoti, sīlasampanno hoti, cāgasampanno hoti, paññāsampanno hoti.
segments.en: It’s when a female is accomplished in faith, ethics, generosity, and wisdom.
And how is a female accomplished in faith?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saddho hoti … pe …
segments.en: It’s when a female has faith in the Realized One’s awakening …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saddhāsampanno hoti.
segments.en: That’s how a female is accomplished in faith.
And how is a female accomplished in ethics?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti … pe …
segments.en: It’s when a female doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie,
or consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo sīlasampanno hoti.
segments.en: That’s how a female is accomplished in ethics.
And how is a female accomplished in generosity?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati … pe …
segments.en: It’s when she lives at home rid of the stain of stinginess, freely generous, open-handed, loving to let go, committed to charity, loving to give and to share.

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo cāgasampanno hoti.
segments.en: That’s how a female is accomplished in generosity.
And how is a female accomplished in wisdom?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo paññavā hoti … pe …
segments.en: It’s when a female is wise. She has the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo paññāsampanno hoti.
segments.en: That’s how a female is accomplished in wisdom.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo paralokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraloko āraddho hotīti.
segments.en: A female who has these four qualities is practicing to win in the next life, and she succeeds at it.
She’s organized at work,
and manages the domestic help.
She’s loveable to her husband,
and preserves his wealth.
Faithful, accomplished in ethics,
being kind and rid of stinginess.
She always purifies the path
to well-being in lives to come.
And so, a lady in whom
these eight qualities are found
is known as virtuous,
firm in principle, and truthful.
Accomplished in sixteen respects,
complete with the eight factors,
a virtuous laywoman such as she
is reborn in the realm of the Loveable Gods.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, a female who has four qualities is practicing…

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha teaches the mendicants four qualities through which a woman succeeds in this life, and four through which she succeeds in the next.
